item.title: AI’s power demands spark new joint GE Vernova–NRG electricity plant project
item.description: NRG flags need for new partnerships to fuel power development.

item.title: Bank of America says buy the dip in this gambling stock despite NJ tax hike fears

item.title: Microsoft just formed the foreboding 'death cross' chart pattern
item.description: A death cross is a price chart pattern that forms when a stock's 50-day moving average slips below its 200-day moving average.

item.title: ‘I’m an endless honey pot’: My wife and I are in our 70s. We gave our son $40,000 for his L.A. wedding. Now he wants more.
